Question 126) The huge amount of waste generated by the growing consumption of society brings to humanity a socio -environmental concern, especially by the amount of waste produced. In addition to recycling and reuse, quality of life can further improve conventional polymers with biodegradable polymers.
These polymers have great socio -environmental advantages in relation to conventional ones because
A) They are not toxic.
B) need not be recycled.
C) do not cause environmental pollution when discarded.
D) are degraded at a time much shorter than conventional ones.
E) have mechanical properties similar to conventional.
